GamepadPoseLinearVelocity.summary: The linearVelocity read-only property of the interface returns an array representing the linear velocity vector of the , in meters per second.

remarks.para: In other words, the current velocity at which the sensor is moving along the x, y, and z axes.

GamepadPoseLinearVelocity.value: A , or null if the gamepad is not able to provide linear velocity data.
